services.headline: What We Do
services.subheadline: From routine maintenance to complex installations, our certified technicians handle every job with care and precision.

items.title: Emergency Repairs
items.description: Burst pipes, overflows, and gas leaks — our team is on call around the clock. Average response time under 30 minutes in the Portland metro.

items.title: Water Heater Installation
items.description: Tank and tankless water heater installation, replacement, and repair. We work with all major brands and offer same-day service on most models.

items.title: Drain Cleaning
items.description: Slow drains, clogs, and backups cleared fast with professional hydro-jetting and camera inspection. No guesswork, no surprises.

items.title: Bathroom Remodels
items.description: Full-service bathroom renovation including fixture installation, re-piping, tile work coordination, and ADA-compliant upgrades.

items.title: Pipe Repair & Replacement
items.description: Trenchless pipe repair, copper re-piping, and PEX upgrades. We minimize disruption to your property with modern techniques.

items.title: Sewer Line Service
items.description: Video inspection, root removal, and full sewer line replacement. We diagnose the problem before we dig so you only pay for what you need.

items.quote: Called at 11 PM with a burst pipe in our basement. Marcus and his crew were here in 20 minutes and had it fixed before midnight. Absolute lifesavers.
Precision replaced our 40-year-old galvanized pipes with PEX in two days. They protected our floors, cleaned up every night, and came in under the estimate.
We use Precision for all three of our restaurant locations. They understand commercial plumbing and always work around our operating hours. Highly recommend.
Honest pricing, no upselling. They told me my water heater had another year or two left instead of pushing a replacement. That kind of integrity is rare.

items.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency service?
items.answer: Yes. Our emergency line is staffed around the clock, 365 days a year. For urgent issues like burst pipes, gas leaks, or sewage backups, we typically arrive within 30 minutes anywhere in the Portland metro area.

items.question: Are you licensed and insured?
items.answer: Absolutely. Precision Plumbing Co. holds an Oregon CCB license (#204817) and carries full general liability and workers' compensation insurance. We're happy to provide proof of insurance for any job.

items.question: How much does a typical service call cost?
items.answer: We charge a flat diagnostic fee of $49 for standard service calls, which is waived if you proceed with the repair. Emergency after-hours calls have a $99 dispatch fee. We always provide a written estimate before starting any work.

items.question: Do you offer financing?
items.answer: Yes. For larger jobs like water heater replacements, re-piping, or bathroom remodels, we offer 0% financing for 12 months through our partnership with GreenSky. Apply during your estimate appointment.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We serve the entire Portland metro area including Beaverton, Lake Oswego, Tigard, Milwaukie, Gresham, Hillsboro, and West Linn. For jobs outside this area, give us a call — we may still be able to help.

items.question: What is your warranty policy?
items.answer: All labor carries a 2-year warranty. Parts are covered by the manufacturer's warranty, which we handle on your behalf. If something we installed fails within the warranty period, we fix it at no charge.
